sense.def:
A warning
je nekaj, kar rečemo ali napišemo, da ljudem povemo za nevarnost, težavo ali kakšno drugo neprijetnost, ki bi se lahko zgodila.

seg.quote: The hospital issued warnings about drugs to be avoided.
Dad gave a final warning to them not to look directly at the sun.
Mary left her husband without any warning.

sense.def:
Dejanja ali znamenja, ki so
warning
, pred nečim opozarjajo.

seg.quote: Watch out for the warning signs of depression like insomnia.
